&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Declare; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Select;
if dbo.AI_ERP$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@stt_rec) = 0 return if @@form = '013' or @@form = '014' begin exec rs_PrintSPTranMultiCopies @stt_rec, @@id, 'm25$$partition$current', 'd25$$partition$current', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, '@@sysDatabaseName'&externalMasterDetail;&PrintVATType;&PrintVATData; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result; return end &GLTranReportSql; else begin declare @m_ma_nt0 varchar(10), @key varchar(128), @mau_hddt varchar(33), @so_seri_hddt varchar(33), @so_ct_hddt varchar(33) select @m_ma_nt0 = val from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0'
if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_sd_hddt' and val = '1') begin select @mau_hddt = mau_hddt, @so_seri_hddt = so_seri_hddt, @so_ct_hddt = so_ct_hddt from hddt00$$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec if @so_ct_hddt = '' begin select @mau_hddt = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'EI001' select @so_seri_hddt = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'EI002' select @so_ct_hddt = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'EI003' end end
if (@@form = '911' or @@form = '921' or @@form = '931' or @@form = '941') begin declare @bilingual tinyint, @l char(1) select @bilingual = 1, @l = 'V' select case when a.ong_ba <> '' then rtrim(a.ong_ba) else '' end as ong_ba, rtrim(a.ma_kh) as ma_kh, rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh, rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, rtrim(e.dia_chi) as dia_chi, rtrim(a.dien_giai) as dien_giai, a.so_seri, ltrim(a.so_ct) so_ct, rtrim(a.tk) as tk, rtrim(c.ten_tk) as ten_tk, rtrim(c.ten_tk2) as ten_tk2, a.t_tien2, a.t_tien_nt2, a.t_thue, a.t_thue_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'V') as t_tien_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'V') as t_tien_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') as t_tien_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') as t_tien_nt_in_word2, replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam , &Master.XMLSelect; as customize from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join dmtk c with(nolock) on a.tk = c.tk left join ctgt21 e with(nolock) on a.stt_rec = e.stt_rec &Master.Join; where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec
select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintSPTran @@language, @key, 'd25$$partition$current', @@id, @bilingual&externalDetail; end else begin if @@form = '910' or @@form = '920' or @@form = '930' or @@form = '940' begin select case when a.ong_ba <> '' then rtrim(a.ong_ba) else '' end as ong_ba, rtrim(a.ma_kh) as ma_kh, case when @@language = 'V' then rtrim(b.ten_kh) else rtrim(b.ten_kh2) end as ten_kh, rtrim(e.dia_chi) as dia_chi, rtrim(a.dien_giai) as dien_giai, a.so_seri, ltrim(a.so_ct) so_ct, rtrim(a.tk) as tk, case when @@language = 'V' then rtrim(c.ten_tk) else rtrim(c.ten_tk2) end as ten_tk, a.t_tien2, a.t_tien_nt2, a.t_thue, a.t_thue_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @@language) as t_tien_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @@language) as t_tien_nt_in_word, replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam , &Master.XMLSelect; as customize from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join dmtk c with(nolock) on a.tk = c.tk left join ctgt21 e with(nolock) on a.stt_rec = e.stt_rec &Master.Join; where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec
select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintSPTran @@language, @key, 'd25$$partition$current', @@id, 0&externalDetail; end else begin if @@form = '011' or @@form = '021' begin select a.ong_ba as doi_tac, a.ma_kh, e.ten_kh as ten_kh, e.ten_kh as ten_kh2, e.ma_so_thue, e.dia_chi, b.tk_nh, b.ngan_hang, b.tinh_thanh, c.ten_ngan as thanh_toan, c.ten_ngan2 as thanh_toan2, case when @@language = 'V' then N'1: Lưu' else '1: Backup' end as so_lien, isnull(@mau_hddt, isnull(k.ky_hieu, '')) as ky_hieu, isnull(@so_seri_hddt, a.so_seri) as so_seri, isnull(@so_ct_hddt, a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.ngay_ct, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Einvoice$GetTaxRateName(d.thue_suat) as thue_suat, a.ma_nt, a.t_tien2, a.t_tien_nt2, a.t_thue, a.t_thue_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @@language) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @@language) as t_tt_nt_in_word, replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, a.dien_giai , &Master.XMLSelect; as customize from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join dmtt c with(nolock) on a.ma_tt = c.ma_tt left join dmthue d with(nolock) on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue left join ctgt21 e with(nolock) on a.stt_rec = e.stt_rec left join v20dmnk k with(nolock) on a.ma_nk = k.ma_nk &Master.Join; where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec end else begin select a.ong_ba as doi_tac, a.ma_kh, e.ten_kh as ten_kh, e.ten_kh as ten_kh2, e.ma_so_thue, e.dia_chi, b.tk_nh, c.ten_ngan as thanh_toan, c.ten_ngan2 as thanh_toan2, case when @@language = 'V' then N'1: Lưu' else '1: Backup' end as so_lien, isnull(@mau_hddt, isnull(k.ky_hieu, '')) as ky_hieu, isnull(@so_seri_hddt, a.so_seri) as so_seri, isnull(@so_ct_hddt, a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.ngay_ct, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Einvoice$GetTaxRateName(d.thue_suat) as thue_suat, a.ma_nt, a.t_tien2, a.t_tien_nt2, a.t_thue, a.t_thue_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien2, @@language) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt2, @@language) as t_tt_nt_in_word, replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, a.dien_giai , &Master.XMLSelect; as customize from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join dmtt c with(nolock) on a.ma_tt = c.ma_tt left join dmthue d with(nolock) on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue left join ctgt21 e with(nolock) on a.stt_rec = e.stt_rec left join v20dmnk k with(nolock) on a.ma_nk = k.ma_nk &Master.Join; where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec end
select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintSPTran @@language, @key, 'd25$$partition$current', @@id, 0&externalDetail; end end end
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result;
